response.overview: Streamed Live on Sunday, January 19, 2020 at 3.30 PM (CET) from Teatro Regio, Parma (Italy). TURANDOT // Music by Giacomo Puccini Libretto by Giuseppe Adami e Renato Simoni  Turandot: REBEKA LOKAR Calaf: CARLO VENTRE Liù: VITTORIA YEO Timur: GIACOMO PRESTIA Ping: FABIO PREVIATI Pang: ROBERTO COVATTA Pong: MATTEO MEZZARO  Conductor: VALERIO GALLI Direction, choreography, scenes and lights: GIUSEPPE FRIGENI  Collaborator in the direction and choreography: MARINA FRIGENI Costumes: AMÉLIE HAAS
response.title: Puccini: Turandot - Teatro Regio, Parma
